question: Which two are true about the JSTL core iteration custom tags? (Choose two.)

options.A: It may iterate over arrays, collections, maps, and strings.
options.C: When looping over collections, a loop status object may be used in the tag body.
options.B: The body of the tag may contain EL code, but not scripting code.
options.E: When looping over integers(for example begin='1' end='10'), a loop status object may not be used in the tag body.
options.D: It may iterate over map, but only the key of the mapping may be used in the tag body.
